name: GENWORLD - OPENWORLD LIFE SIM
description:
Experience Genworld, an ever evolving Openworld Life Simulator that takes place on the fictional island of South kampton.

Rise from the average life to your ultimate idea of the dream life as either a criminal mastermind, loyal citizen, or anything in-between. Enjoy realistic vehicles from low-powered to high-powered which can all be upgraded and customized, from the paint colour to performance upgrades or visual upgrades to make each vehicle truly unique to you.

Own anything from aircraft, weapons, properties, Military aircraft, or even military submarines or tanks to be sure to show off your financial success. Use your owned assets in events to earn cash to spend in-game and increase your financial wealth, but be sure to choose wisely as each item has unique stats.

Genworld not only offers you access to a multitude of items to buy and upgrade. Genworld is set in an ever evolving openworld that dynamically changes depending on the moon phases, weather, time of day, and of course the location and wildlife. Explore different locations from deserts to sprawling cities to discover new animals that may be unique to certain locations and follow realistic daily routines. Each location has interest points to discover, with each interest point offering another unique location to explore.

There are dozens of unique ways to make money on the island of South kampton. Genworld offers a unique business system that allows your entrepreneurial side to shine and is sure to make the experience unique compared to anything else. Genworld even offers a whole list of jobs that pay you for your work each in-game hour.

COMING ON THE 23/04/2023
